Package game

Class ZombieArm

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.Limb
game.ZombieArm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Weapon, ItemInterface
public class ZombieArm
extends Limb
implements Weapon
A Zombie's arm. This class models a Zombie's arm, as a limb, that can be used as a Weapon when detached from the host Zombie. Provides methods to drop the ZombieArm and get its damage and description when wielded as a simple club.
Author:
Isaac Lee Kian Min
